constructor.details: Constructor sets the owner and RoleManager contract address

params._productId: ID of the bookshelf or shipment

returns._0: paymentId The ID of the created payment

getPaymentByProduct(string).details: Get payment ID by product ID

getPaymentStatusByProduct(string).details: Get payment status by product ID

isProductPaid(string).details: Check if a product is paid for

returns._0: True if the product is paid for

processPayment(uint256,string).details: Process a payment (mark it as paid)

params._transactionReference: Reference to the off-chain refund transaction

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfer ownership of the contract (only owner)
